title: Earthquake tremors felt in Zhob
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 15 (APP):Earthquake tremors were felt on Monday in the Zhob area of Balochistan.
According to the seismological center, the earthquake had a magnitude of 3.9 and a depth of 35 km, reported a private news channel.
The epicenter was located 79 km south of Zhob.
No loss of life or property was reported as a result of the earthquake.
